description.0: Once upon a time, there was a youkai that roamed Inazuma in the form of a lantern's flame. This must once have been one of its vessels.

0.0: Increase ATK by <cryo>20%</cryo> and Movement SPD by 10% for 10s when using an Elemental Skill.

1.0: Increase ATK by <cryo>25%</cryo> and Movement SPD by 10% for 10s when using an Elemental Skill.

2.0: Increase ATK by <cryo>30%</cryo> and Movement SPD by 10% for 10s when using an Elemental Skill.

3.0: Increase ATK by <cryo>35%</cryo> and Movement SPD by 10% for 10s when using an Elemental Skill.

4.0: Increase ATK by <cryo>40%</cryo> and Movement SPD by 10% for 10s when using an Elemental Skill.
